extendedInfo.description: *** NEW 2013-08-13 ***In the next few hours will release an update that fixes the login into game---Gin Rummy Online World Championship!The classic game where 2 players race to 100 points with online multiplayer, friends, chat, ranking, tournaments and more!Wherever you go, you can now have a host of real life players ready to take you on in the classic game all over the world! (Wi-FI, 3G, 4G, Bluethoot not) Features:* Multiple languages* Login with facebook or android.* Online Multiplayer* Simple and intuitive game play* Global rank* Chat* True random shuffle.* Detailed player stats* Scoring system balanced.* Post your stats and game scores on Facebook.* Create tables with password (only FULL version)* Daily rank (only FULL version)* Weekly rank (only FULL version)* Unlimited games by day (only FULL version)* Send private messages (only FULL version)* History of your games played (only FULL version)* Trial 30 daysRelated card games: Biriba, Buraco, Canasta, Carioca, Conquian, Desmoche, Dummy rummy, Indian Rummy, Kalooki, Khanhoo, Indian Marriage, Mahjong, Rumino, Rummikub, Shanghai rum, Ten pennies, Three thirteen, Zigity, ZioncheckUpcoming projects:pyramids, bumper jack, uno undercover, sky bounce, bejeweled twist, coffee rush, cribbage, monopoly, Klaverjas, Schwimmen, Crazy Eights, Sevens, Indian Poker

reviews.title: sid
reviews.comment: Best ol game ever bt 2 games a day will be improved
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Like a feedback from before cant organise it they way you want it . Sometimes wont recognize the first pushes to a button and its a very very simple layout and there isnt any rules or how to play instuctions with this game. We know the basics but how to use your kind of layout would be helpful. I had to play a few games just to get a hang of the features..
reviews.author: Roselyn Masuhr

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: It is very good entertainment game.
reviews.author: karthi .t

reviews.title: Needs more than two games a day..
reviews.comment: Great game. Really fun. Really wish you could play more than two games a day. :)
reviews.author: Elena Kirkland

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if log in problems were fixed. Enjoy playing with real people.
reviews.author: karen groves

reviews.title: Game is great but. ..
reviews.comment: The game is great but I seem to have constant issues with logging in. You open up the app and it doesnt do anything. Very frustrating. Hope they will sort this out
reviews.author: Georgie Redford

reviews.title: Nice ol gamr
reviews.comment: More than 2 games a day plzz .....
reviews.author: ravi reddy

reviews.title: Invasion Of Privacy
reviews.comment: In order 2 play they want ALL of your personal information. Ridiculous!
reviews.author: Michelle Lacombe

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Nyc game

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.comment: Excellent game and great fun online.

reviews.title: Yfgtr
reviews.comment: Jnf
reviews.author: alexander joaquin c santos

reviews.title: Love the Game But....
reviews.comment: I love the game, but I don\'t like that the free version only lets u play 2 games every 24 hrs. :-/
reviews.author: Eshe Szmurlo

reviews.title: Wont open
reviews.comment: Everything was fine but now since yesterday I cant play. The game wont open. Ive tried reinstalling twice. It gets stuck at contacting server. Ive even tried clearing my data turning off my phone. Nothing works. Please help! I miss playing.
reviews.author: Miranda Birdsong

reviews.title: Too many bugs
reviews.comment: Seems to have a few flaws. Gives you cards that were discarded earlier. Oftem find Same cards in both players hands at knock.
reviews.author: Shawn Desjardins

reviews.title: What could be better.
reviews.comment: I\'m happy with everything about it. It\'s still early though. Ha ha ha.
reviews.author: Ross Vehring

reviews.title: Gheyyyyy
reviews.comment: Umm messed up my knock three times in one game. Wont let you organize cards how you want. Doesnt recognize reorganizing certain sets. Defults to four of a kind instead being able to use one for a run.
reviews.author: Lace Difranco

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: It crashes every now and then, otherwise I love Gin and love this app
reviews.author: April T

reviews.title: APP IS DOWN
reviews.comment: Been playing here for months and as of 8/11 it will no longer boot. Cant get past the initial area where the server is checked. Usually takes less than 2 seconds. Anyone else experiencing the same thing??  Toms, Bruce, Mali, Jakoo, Lola, Sergio (not), Gin H, Edward B, Beth, Kurt, Kaye G, Rich, Ali, S, Sh, Daddy, Mommy, George, Gary.Helppppp  Still 5 stars...app is the best...please  fix
reviews.author: Fred Kennedy

reviews.title: Addicting!!!
reviews.comment: LovED it untill it won\'t let you log in until you pay for the full version....what a waste!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love this game. it\'s the best gin rummy app out there. You will not want to uninstall this anytime soon. Buy it with confidence
